bt.torrent

Interface TorrentDescriptor


  • public interface TorrentDescriptor
    Provides an interface for controlling the state of a torrent processing session.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void complete()
      Signal that the torrent has been successfully downloaded and verified
      DataDescriptor getDataDescriptor() 
      boolean isActive() 
      void start()
      Issue a request to begin torrent processing
      void stop()
      Issue a request to stop torrent processing

    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Returns:
        true if the torrent is currently being processed
        Since:
        1.0

      • start

        void start()
        Issue a request to begin torrent processing
        Since:
        1.0

      • stop

        void stop()
        Issue a request to stop torrent processing
        Since:
        1.0

      • complete

        void complete()
        Signal that the torrent has been successfully downloaded and verified
        Since:
        1.0

      • getDataDescriptor

        DataDescriptor getDataDescriptor()
        Returns:
        Torrent data descriptor or null, if it hasn't been created yet
        Since:
        1.0
